title: Personal Chef
original_prompt: I want you to act as my personal chef. I will tell you about my dietary preferences and allergies, and you will suggest recipes for me to try. You should only reply with the recipes you recommend, and nothing else. Do not write explanations. My first request is
input1: I am vegetarian, allergic to nuts, and I love Italian cuisine. Please suggest some recipes for me to try.
input2: I follow a gluten-free diet, have a shellfish allergy, and enjoy spicy Asian dishes. Please recommend some recipes for me to try.
input1_ans:
1. **Pasta Primavera**  
   - Ingredients: Spaghetti, bell peppers, zucchini, cherry tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, basil, salt, and pepper.  
   - Instructions: Cook spaghetti, sauté vegetables in olive oil with garlic, mix with pasta, and garnish with basil.

2. **Margherita Pizza**  
   - Ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, fresh basil, olive oil, salt.  
   - Instructions: Spread sauce on dough, add mozzarella, bake until golden, and top with basil and olive oil.

3. **Eggplant Parmesan**  
   - Ingredients: Eggplant, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, olive oil, basil.  
   - Instructions: Slice and bake eggplant, layer with marinara and cheeses, top with breadcrumbs, and bake until bubbly.

4. **Risotto with Mushrooms**  
   - Ingredients: Arborio rice, vegetable broth, mushrooms, onion, garlic, white wine, Parmesan cheese, parsley.  
   - Instructions: Sauté onion and garlic, add mushrooms, stir in rice, gradually add broth, and finish with cheese and parsley.

5. **Caprese Salad**  
   - Ingredients: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, fresh basil, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, and pepper.  
   - Instructions: Layer mozzarella and tomatoes, drizzle with olive oil and balsamic, and sprinkle with basil, salt, and pepper.

1. **Pasta Primavera**  
   Ingredients: Pasta, seasonal vegetables (bell peppers, zucchini, cherry tomatoes), olive oil, garlic, basil, Parmesan cheese.

2. **Margherita Pizza**  
   Ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, fresh basil, olive oil.

3. **Risotto alla Milanese**  
   Ingredients: Arborio rice, vegetable broth, saffron, onion, white wine, Parmesan cheese, butter.

4. **Caprese Salad**  
   Ingredients: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, fresh basil, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, and pepper.

5. **Eggplant Parmesan**  
   Ingredients: Eggplant, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, basil.

6. **Mushroom and Spinach Lasagna**  
   Ingredients: Lasagna noodles, ricotta cheese, spinach, mushrooms, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese.

7. **Pesto Pasta (Nut-Free)**  
   Ingredients: Pasta, basil, garlic, olive oil, Parmesan cheese, lemon juice (omit nuts).

8. **Stuffed Bell Peppers**  
   Ingredients: Bell peppers, quinoa or rice, black beans, corn, diced tomatoes, Italian seasoning, cheese.
input2_ans:
1. **Spicy Thai Basil Chicken (Pad Krapow Gai)**
   - Ingredients: Ground chicken, Thai basil, garlic, bird's eye chili, soy sauce (gluten-free), fish sauce, sugar, and jasmine rice.
   - Instructions: Stir-fry garlic and chili, add ground chicken, then stir in sauces and basil. Serve over rice.

2. **Gluten-Free Spicy Korean Tofu Stir-Fry**
   - Ingredients: Firm tofu, gochujang (Korean chili paste), soy sauce (gluten-free), bell peppers, broccoli, garlic, and sesame oil.
   - Instructions: Sauté garlic, add tofu and vegetables, stir in gochujang and soy sauce, and cook until heated through.

3. **Szechuan Spicy Chicken**
   - Ingredients: Chicken breast, Szechuan peppercorns, dried red chilies, garlic, ginger, soy sauce (gluten-free), and green onions.
   - Instructions: Stir-fry chicken with garlic, ginger, and spices, then add soy sauce and cook until done. Garnish with green onions.

4. **Spicy Mango Chicken Salad**
   - Ingredients: Grilled chicken, mixed greens, mango, red onion, cilantro, lime juice, and chili flakes.
   - Instructions: Toss all ingredients together and serve chilled.

5. **Gluten-Free Spicy Peanut Noodles**
   - Ingredients: Rice noodles, peanut butter, soy sauce (gluten-free), garlic, ginger, chili paste, and green onions.
   - Instructions: Cook noodles, mix sauce ingredients, combine with noodles, and top with green onions.

6. **Chili Garlic Eggplant Stir-Fry**
   - Ingredients: Eggplant, garlic, ginger, soy sauce (gluten-free), chili paste, and green onions.
   - Instructions: Stir-fry garlic and ginger, add eggplant, then stir in sauces and cook until tender. Garnish with green onions.

1. Spicy Thai Basil Chicken (Pad Krapow Gai) - Use gluten-free soy sauce and serve with jasmine rice.

2. Szechuan Spicy Tofu Stir-Fry - Tofu, bell peppers, and Szechuan peppercorns in a spicy sauce.

3. Gluten-Free Spicy Korean BBQ Beef (Bulgogi) - Marinate beef in gluten-free soy sauce, garlic, and gochujang.

4. Spicy Asian Zucchini Noodles - Toss spiralized zucchini with a spicy sesame sauce and vegetables.

5. Thai Red Curry with Vegetables - Use coconut milk, red curry paste, and your choice of vegetables.
